🗨️ #ESMA #Maijoor: The third paradox refers to establishing a robust & extensive #disclosure regime covering as many companies as possible to ensure that information by investee companies is available, while maintaining proportionate requirements especially for smaller companies. https://t.co/AG5TYtSI7c

🟢 #ESMA Chair #Maijoor: #Greenwashing gives rise to a contagion chain and there is no single-shot vaccine to address it, but it is rather a combination: #standards should be principles-based and developed in the public interest and the protection of users.

🟢 #ESMA Chair #Maijoor: We should not be naïve regarding #greenwashing. What is often emphasised is the element of misconduct of issuers/ financial market participants. But greenwashing has a lot to do with the degree of robustness of the framework underlying the reported data. https://t.co/7VO08trxJb

🗨️ #ESMA Chair #Maijoor: The second paradox relates to the importance of ensuring that the #disclosure #standards are sufficiently robust to help prevent the risk of greenwashing, while at the same time allowing for sufficient flexibility for entities to tell their own story. https://t.co/YLjXBsVAjy

🗨️ #ESMA Chair #Maijoor: The first paradox of sustainability reporting relates to the the need to ensure that reporting standards are, at the same time, international and jurisdiction-specific.
